post.body: I assume/desperately hope you don't mean YOUR car.
Thank you for having us. Noah had so much fun playing with all the kiddies! I think he totally has a crush on Zoe.
Where did you get that idea? I love her!
Enjoy your holiday in Le Yuletide Bordello.
LUCKY! I'm such a fan.
Ah yes. The puddle jumper. The best way to be cramped and uncomfortable while violently scraping death.
Still happily finding Goldfish Crackers all over the house. Noah left a trail.
Had an incredible, memorable time with Noah: opening presents, bouncing on the couch, playing with trucks & singing songs. Merry Christmas!
Playing Rock Band with my sister and her hubby. They're quite good.
Being haunted by The Innocence Mission's "I Never Knew You from the Sun."
Spent a wonderful evening with Noah. Everything he does amazes me.
Feist on "A Colbert Christmas" = joy joy joy.
Countdown reset. Flight delayed. I don't get to see Noah tonight. :(
My boy comes into town today! Counting down the seconds.
Decorating the house while listening to Tschaikovsky.
Just went to see Doubt, which my friend Ben worked on. Good job, Ben! And excellent film. There will be Oscars.
Chilly and rainy outside. Recording warm and lovely music with Connie Kim inside.
Celebrate the season in a non-cheesy way. My Christmas EP, "Snow Day," is available on iTunes. Makes a great gift!
Dear Mary McDonnell, I love you.
Marching in the Electric Soft Parade.
